title: To Riot From Evelynn: "Why do you hate me?"
body:
{{champion:28}} Finally sees a good amount of play. Decent but not overwhelming. Modest winrate.

Riot - Not on my watch..

Nerf

replies.body: It's because she's having an identity crisis. People can play her as an assassin, tank, and bruiser depending on how they build. It's like elise. If they buff one thing too much or tweak some numbers one role will outshine the others even though thats now how she is meant to be played. She is meant to be an assassin but she's always built sort of tanky because late game she just blows up.

yet current master yi can build sated devourer, botrk, and either lw or ie, then build full tank.

still do fuck tons, but be super tanky
you deserve to lose if you don't abuse the fact the game is a 5v4 for 20 minutes, even more if you take every scuttle and counterjungle occasionally

This is exactly how I respond to {{champion:75}} QQ threads.

{{champion:11}} may have the most efficient jungle clears in the game, but his early ganks are utter shit and he is trash if his team falls behind, which happens more often than not since he doesn't gank much.

Uhm.  Nasus is a bit of a different beast than Yi.  While it may be a 5v4, but I think that comparison is a bit unequal in terms of the way the champions work.

Yi afk farms the jungle, Nasus afk farms a lane.

The jungle has no turrets, but does have dragons (contestable during his period of afk) and baron (generally untouchable until after sated).  Whereas the lane most has turrets and inhibitors (which are contestable pretty much the entire game).  One you actually can ignore because you can take his primary objectives (turrets), the other you cannot ecause he will win the game (because he literally destroyed your base).
Which is why they buffed dragon to the point that Yi can't solo it anymore. I don't care what you say, Yi can farm all he wants but those objectives are still going to get stolen by the enemy team.

Yi can in fact solo dragon very easily with devourer and a Vamp scepter, sometimes with only the devourer since you can just Q the dragon's shot, time your W to negate a lot of that damage too... Yeeaah.
Actually that is my point.  I was saying that Nasus is a bigger threat than Yi because Nasus actually contests noticeable objectives xD

u ever see a runeglaive ap evelynn one shot ur adc

I did last game and I also saw her do it back in the day with her E when it did magic damage. Riot's logic. Let's keep a basic ability at 100% ratio, nerf everything else in her kit, wonder why she does well still, then changes E to physical, thinking they've solved the problem, then add item that makes half of it do magic damage, turning it into an 80% with magic damage scaling and 50% to physical damage, and they're saying Ezreal is the one abuser of Runeglaive. roflmao. 

Riot could change her E back to magical and just nerf its ratio and it'd be fine, but they've decided to nerf every other part of her kit. Literally every part. Her W, her R, and her Q have all received nerfs since her rework, but her E has never been nerfed despite the fact that it was her burst potential. lol. 

Now, what's really made her OP is the fact that they did buff her Q's damage to do 55% of her AP while on a 1.5s cd. With a tiny bit of CDR and it may as well be Cass's E. lol. So, her burst is about 130% of her AP instantly, then constant DPS from her Q. The buff to her Q was after the change of her E to physical, sort of a compensation. It's just silly. They always overload her kit with silly things. She'll be back to normal after next patch when Runeglaive is more worthless than a TM against an AP team.
Eve is a mess. I love her but she needs to be gutted and redone since Riot doesn't know what to do with her with her current kit.
